titleStmt.title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie callyng to her good remembraunce howe well this realme is furnyshed with good lawes and orders, for redresse of many enormities ...
Proclamations. 1562-05-07
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: In Powles Church yarde by Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Proclamation requiring observation of statutes on apparell and the decay of horses.
